REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0358 reute r f BC-FINANCIAL-SANTA-BARBA 03-02 0048

TEXT.TITLE: FINANCIAL SANTA BARBARA <FSB> TO MAKE PURCHASE
TEXT.BODY: Financial Corp of Santa Barbara said it has signed a definitive agreement to purchase Stanwell Financial, the lending operations unit of mortgage banking company <Stanwell Mortgage>, for undisclosed terms. Reuter
